column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
Steve, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My podiatrist strongly suggested Tineacide in lieu of Lamisil to treat my toenail fungus.  I was reluctant based on what I have read about how ineffective topical treatments for toenail fungus were, but I decided to try it since she reported a 97% success rate.  Well, it's been three months an there has been absolutely no measurable improvement.  So, that 97% was probably unfounded or skewed.  Probably didn't hurt that the doctor was also a distributor of the product.
